title: Bug 49110runtime.JspFactoryImpl$PageContextPool needs to be static
description: Bug 49110runtime.JspFactoryImpl$PageContextPool needs to be static Findbugs says:Bug: org.apache.jasper.runtime.JspFactoryImpl$PageContextPool needs to be static to avoid a deadly embrace with org.apache.jasper.runtime.JspFactoryImpl.localPoolPattern id: SICTHREADLOCALDEADLYEMBRACE, type: SIC, category: CORRECTNESSThis class is an inner class, but should probably be a static inner class. As it is, there is a serious danger of a deadly embrace between the inner class and the thread local in the outer class.
OB: Because the inner class isn't static, it retains a reference to the outer class. If the thread local contains a reference to an instance of the inner class, the inner and outer instance will both be reachable and not eligible for garbage collection.
